column1: full ball, strayng down the pads, and he looks to flick. Gets it down to fine leg
length ball, angles across him, and just about goes past the outside edge as Khawaja looks to defend from the crease
length, straight, and he can tuck it away off his pads towards square leg
length, wide of off-stump, and he leaves. Dhoni collects it diving away in front of first slip. Lucky to get away without that being called wide
length, angles across him, and he defends from the crease
wide, and well wide of the tramlines this time. Doesn't get away with this one
length, outside off, and he leaves
length, outside off, and it keeps a touch low, as Finch presses forward to defend
length, outside off, and he gets up on his toes and punches this through covers. Top shot!
length, jagging back in with the seam, and he allows it to come into him and defends close to his body
length, wider, bowled at 138.6kph, and he plays it square of the wicket. A bit airy, but gets it to the left of point

length ball, has jagged back in at 141.8kph, and rapped him on the pads. Loud appeal, and they finally review it after it was turned down initially. The front foot is fine, gets back in appreciably, and also misses the bat. Finch was high up off the ground as he looked to defend, so height could be the only question. And it is! Goes over the stumps, and so India lose their review early!
fuller. faster, and goes down leg as it hits him on the pads again. Bumrah building up a head of steam with a ball at 144kph
length, angles in, and he can glance it down towards fine leg
full, down leg perhaps, as it raps him on the pads. Good pace too, and as ever, the ball nipping back in is causing problems to Finch
length ball, angles in from outside off at 141.6kph, and he presses forward to defend this time
shorter, comes back into him, and he defends this towards short midwicket
length, angles into him, and he plays it towards short midwicket
length ball, comes back in and he defends
length ball, angles across him at 139.5ks, and he defends
length, and he comes forward to unleash a handsome drive. Cannot beat short cover though
short of a length, and he goes back and pulls this in front of square on the on side. The ball just stopped a bit and sat up and begged to be punished...and he did
length, angles across him, and he maneouvres himself across the crease in trying to flick it. Gets it to short midwicket
fuller, and beats the outside edge, as he looks to launch into a cover drive. Bowled at 145.2kph
length, angles away from him, and he tries to run it down towards third man. Luckily for Khawaja, he was far away from making any contact
length ball, comes back into him at 141.6kph, and he presses forward to defend
length ball, comes back into him, and he presses forward to defend this
length, and he gets on top of it and runs it down towards short midwicket

fuller, outside off, and he drives it. Straight back at the bowler, whose foot it hits and pops up towards Virat Kohli, who has a shy at the stumps! Finch just about makes his ground, scrambling away. Shami walks away with a hobble. That had hit him flush on the shin. OW!
length, and he goes back and tries to play this away towards square leg. There's a fielder stationed there, alongside short midwicket
fuller. and he drives this handsomely...but Kuldeep Yadav dives away to his left at mid on and stops it. Saves three for India
full, and straight back towards the bowler. Good shot, but no runs as it ricochets off towards mid on
short, and he goes up on his toes to defend an incoming ball
short, and he goes back to drive it straight down towards silly mid on
full, wide, and he launches into a drive. Takes the outer edge and flies away towards third man. Bowled at 140.5kph
length, angles across him at 140.5kph, and he drives it towards short cover

edged, and goes past MS Dhoni! Fuller ball, that angles across him, and he might well have deliberately adjusted late to nurdle this past Dhoni to his left, with no slips in place any longer. Ran away very quickly towards the third man fence on what looks like a lightening-quick outfield
length, outside off, and he drives it down to long off
pulls out the reverse lap sweep, and places it to perfection
defends a length ball towards the leg side
goes for the reverse sweep, and top-edges this. It carries towards Shikhar Dhawan, who stops it but cannot hold on. Chance missed!
length ball, and he defends off the back foot
goes back and drives a short ball outside off through covers. Shortens the length beautifully by using the depth of the crease
length ball, and he defends
length ball, and he comes forward to drive and gets it down towards third man off the edge
length ball, angles away from him at 143.9kph, and he is beaten as he looks to defend this
short, and he goes and goes for the pull. Doesn't time it well, though, as it lands short of short midwicket
length ball, and straight at him, and he shuffles across and flicks this past square leg. Sheer timing as the ball rockets away
length ball, and he drives it down to mid on
short, and he goes back and plays it against the turn towards long on
presses forward and defends a length ball
goes back and flicks a fuller ball, straight towards short fine leg, who is fielding quite square at the moment
reverse sweep, and gets it down to third man with a roll of the wrists. Excellent!
full ball, and he drives it down to short midwicket
defends a length ball off the back foot
starts by dragging one down the leg side, and he whips it off his legs towards long leg. And the ball races away!
presses forward to defend a length ball tossed up outside off
tossed up, and he comes forward to drive it on the half-volley, and gets it to short extra cover
length, and he goes back and drives it towards short midwicket
flighted, and he biffs this down the ground towards long on. Great shot to bring up 50!
goes back and drives this towards mid off
length ball, and he fetches it from outside off and gets it down towards long leg. Good running gets them two runs
length ball, outside off, and he defends
presses forward to a length ball, and somehow gets the ball down towards fine leg. Just off the edge of the bat, as he lapped it fine, though Jadeja went up in an appeal
short, and he plays an uppish cut, but way beyond backward point. Excellent placement!
tossed up, and he drives this towards long off
length, and he presses forward to drive this with the turn towards long on
he is greeted with a sublime cover drive. Pitched up, and he just eases into this. Top shot!
length, outside off, and he drives and misses out on contact this time
length, and he walks into this one and looks to force it down the ground. Beats the outside edge again!
wide of off stump, and he looks to cut this one, and plays over the length of this one. Kept a bit low, and he could also have under-edged this one. Khawaja looking a little restless here...
length, and he goes forward to drive this down to long off. A better shot, and a result of retaining his shape better this time
full ball, and he drives it hard into the wicket, and Shankar fields off his own bowling
goes back and punches a length ball turning into him towards point
tosses this up, and he drives it straight down to long on
fuller, and he drives this with the turn towards long on
drives a length ball towards long on
length ball, that he works off his legs towards square leg
tossed up, and he drives this beyond covers
length ball, driven down to long on
length ball, and he goes back and punches it away with a wristly flourish beyond short midwicket
length ball, straight at Finch, who presses forward and defends this
full ball, and he drives it hard. Shankar half-stops it, but doesn't go on to the stumps, which could have had Khawaja in trouble at the non-striker's end
length ball, and he plays it with soft hands. Goes close to the stumps, but slow enough for them to switch ends for a quick single
length ball, and he drives it back towards short midwicket
tosses his first ball up, and Finch hammers this across the line, depositing it deep into the stands beyond midwicket
full ball, down leg, and he looks for a sweep, but misses out on contact
down leg again, full again, and he misses a sweep again. Called a wide, and Jadhav has a quizzical look on his face. Understandably so, as it seems to have run off his gloves towards fine leg
fuller ball, outside off, and he forces it down to long on
goes back and cuts a short ball, but cannot beat point
fuller ball, angles into him, and he punches it down towards deep midwicket
straight ball, and he stretches to defend one that goes on straight with the arm
jumps down the wicket and punches a ball from outside off towards long off
length, and he walks across and tries to flick this off his pads, but cannot beat short fine leg
length, outside off, and he drops it with soft hands towards point
length, outside off, and he slices it down towards third man
length, and he punches it towards extra cover
length, and he punches it towards short cover
short, and he runs it down towards third man
rifles one in towards off stump, and he presses forward to drive this towards long off
tossed up, and Finch fetches this from outside off and drags it down towards midwicket. Timed it sweetly, and perhaps into the moat again!
low trajectory ball, but gives him room outside off, and Finch goes back and across to cut this away fiercely. Good attempt by the fielder to pull it back, but that's FIFTY for Finch!
tossed up, and he goes for the drag down the wicket again. It just about clears Kuldeep Yadav at a wide long on position!
length, and he goes back this time and flicks a ball pitched on leg away towards square leg
fires this wide down leg side, and would have been wide if the batsman had missed. Pitched way outside leg, and he was looking to sweep this
goes back to cut, but cannot get it off the square
tossed up outside off, and he leaves
goes back and forces a length ball through extra cover
full, and he drives it towards short cover
full, and he drives it towards cover
sweeps a length ball, and it goes straight towards Rohit Sharma at long leg. Poor bit of fielding, as he lets it spin past him and overruns it!
full just outside leg stump, and he mistimes a flick to the leg side. Ball hits his back leg and rolls down to short fine leg
slower ball, full outside off, and he's through the drive too early. But luckily for Finch, it's placed wide of cover
rolls his fingers over the delivery again. Full on middle, and Khawaja mistimes a drive to mid-on
back of a length on leg, and clipped off his waist after swiveling to deep backward square
length ball, just outside off, and he flat-bats a shot near his body. Ball hits the deck, and bounces towards Shami's head, and he fingertips the ball over the umpire's head
slower ball, too full on middle, and comfortably worked to deep midwicket. Fifty for Khawaja too
length ball on middle, and angling slightly away. Cut off the back foot to point
length ball on middle, and pushed off the back foot with the angled bat. Ball rolls away to cover
full on leg stump, and he works this away - off his heels - to deep backward square
full and wide outside off, and he throws his hands at this. Crunches a square drive to deep point
back of a length on leg, and he swivels to pull along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and only 122.3kph. Stays on the back foot to block
big appeal for lbw, but not given! Length ball lands outside off, but angling in. Finch tries to nudge it square off his pads, but he's inside-edged it into his pads and towards point
length ball going across Khawaja, and he tries to guide it towards point
length ball, on off, and he shuffles onto his back foot to block towards cover
back of a length on off, and he tiptoes to ride the bounce. Punched towards point
full just outside off, and he presses forward to drive. Mistimed to mid-off, stopped by the fielder
full on middle, and sweetly nudged off his pads to deep midwicket. Chase for Dhawan, who pulls the ball back late
full and wide outside off, and he caresses a drive past Rayudu at cover. Mid-off intercepts
length ball on middle, and angling away from the left-hander. Steers a late cut down to third man
nearly chopped on! Length ball, just outside off, and he tries to punch from near his body. Ball jags inwards, and takes the inside edge down to fine leg
full just outside off, and Khawaja presses forward to drive. Ball doesn't angle away as much as he expected, shot's been inside-edged onto his pads
appeal for lbw but this is going down the leg side. Full on middle, and he misses the flick towards the leg side. Umpire not interested
back of a length, just outside off, and Finch shapes up to cut. Under-edges the shot into the deck
length ball on off, and angling in sharply. Defended off the back foot to cover on this occasion
full just outside off, and he picks the slower ball well. Whipped away to the gap near cow corner, and two outfielders must converge there to stop the boundary
full on off, and he tries to drive with the straight bat. Bat's face turns in his hand, and mistimed to mid-on

back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to firmly punch. Vijay Shankar - at cover - looks in line to stop the ball, but he misfields ... and this is another four to wide long off that won't please captain Kohli
full on off, and the wrong'un is driven to midon
length ball on off, and turning away from Khawaja. He pulls, and drags this shot to deep midwicket
full outside off, and the wrong'un goes further away from Finch. But the batsman gets his pads right near the pitch of the ball, and defends towards the off side
full on off, and he skips down the wicket to drill a straight drive down to long-on. Looks like he was loading up for the big shot, but eventually pulled out
full just outside off, and turning away from Khawaja. Steered to first slip, where Kohli dives to his left. Stops the single
pulled over midwicket! Back of a length on off, and turning away from Khawaja. But he takes his chances, and muscles a shot right over the only fielder inside the circle on the leg side
full on off, and he drives with the bat's open face to cover
full on off stump, and he crunches a straight drive to long on
full on leg, and he nudges this off his pads to he leg side
back of a length on leg, and he whips this off his hips past the vacant square-leg region! Exquisite picking of the gap!

full just outside off, and this time Khawaja shows some class. Drives through the covers, past the infield, but Rayudu displays some good acrobatics at wide long-off. Stops the four by putting his arm out
slapped! Length ball, going away and Khawaja has no trouble in using the width. Cuts this behind square, and fine leg is a spectator near the ropes
length ball on off, and skidding into his pads. Flicked off his pads to the leg side
full on leg stump, and the googly spins across Finch's pads and he gloves this sweep-shot into his legs. Umpire Shamsuddin spot on there
full on middle, and he drives through the leg side to deep midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and he cuts along the ground to deep point
full on leg stump, and he comfortably check-drives against the spin to long on
length ball on off, and turning into Finch's pads as he tried to shuffle across. Inside-edges a defensive shot to fine leg. A dominant over from an India bowler after quite a while
length ball on middle, and gripping on the deck. Straightens, and Finch's leg-side nudge takes a leading edge
full on off, and worked away off the front foot
tosses this full outside off, and drives past the cover-fielder to wide long off
length ball on off, and turning into his pads. Flicked off his pads to deep square leg
full and wide outside off, and he drives away from his body to deep extra cover for a walking single
length ball, just outside off, and he blocks off the back foot towards cover
tossed up, turns across him, and he presses forward to defend
presses forward to defend a length ball
turns back into him from middle, and he goes back and misses out on a flick. It hits his pads and runs away towards short fine leg
tossed up, and he pulls out a precise slog sweep! Was in his arc, and he had a right ol' go at this one
tossed up, and he goes back and cuts a ball turning away from him towards backward point
tossed up, and he looks to sweep with the turn. Gets it down to fine leg
full, and wider outside off. Khawaja stretches forward to smother this delivery
length ball, extra bounce with the ball turning in. Khawaja plants his front leg outside off, and mistimes a leg-side pull to short leg
length ball, just outside off, and worked off his pads to deep midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and he shapes up to cut. Struck well, but stopped at point
full just outside off, and Finch takes a big stride forward to caress a drive down to long off
full on middle, and Khawaja shuffles across towards off - exposing his middle and leg stump - before tucking a fine-shot off his toes. Well stopped by short fine leg this time
floaty ball, length on off. Spinning away from Khawaja, as he mistimes a cut to point
flighted full on middle, and Khawaja clears his toes before driving down to long off
full on middle, and Finch clears his front leg before driving inside out. Struck to the fielder at long off
flatter, landing on off and turning away from the batsman. He cuts off the back foot past point for a single
uses his feet! Full on middle, and Finch moves into the nineties with a cracking shot. Meets the ball on the full, and muscles a shot to the wide long-on boundary
lbw appeal, not given! Full on off, and the wrong'un's going away from Finch. He tries to sweep, and gloves this once more. Ball would've missed the stumps anyway
length ball, just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to run this down to third man
length ball on middle, but going down the leg side. Khawaja misses the flick, and Dhoni scampers to his right to collect
back of a length on off, and Khawaja shapes up to pull. But the ball doesn't bounce as much, and whizzes under his bat
length ball, just outside off, and Khawaja presses forward, before opening the bat's face again. Shami at third man cleans up
full just outside off, and jagging inwards. Finch pushes forward to defend
full, a bit too wide outside off, and driven away from his body to deep cover for a single. Too good a shot for just one run
full just outside off, and defended with the bat's open face to point. Ends with a dot
full on leg stump, and he toe-ends an on-drive to long on
full on off stump, and turning away from Khawaja. Pushed off the front foot to cover, and they call for a quick single. Shankar tries the direct-hit at the bowler's end, but he can't hit the stumps
full on leg, and the googly turns across Finch. Defended off the front foot
full on leg, but Finch comes down the wicket and converts it into a full toss. Looks to whip this through the leg side, but inside edges the shot to short fine leg

appeal for lbw, and given! Finch falls for 93? Well, we need to wait. He's reviewing. Length ball on leg, and the ball straightens after pitching. Finch is on the back foot as he misses the flick, and now all we wait for is ball tracking. Here's the replay: and Finch is out! Ball crashing into middle and leg stump, and the India supporters finally find their voice
welcomed with the googly. Full on middle, and spinning across. Firmly driven to long off for one
full on off, and this has been driven straight back to Bumrah. Well stopped with his right hand
full on off, and driven with the bat's open face to mid off. Calls early for the single
length ball just outside off, and angling in. Fended off the back foot after shuffling into his crease
slower ball, only 119.7kph, and Khawaja drives this full ball too early. Checks the shot right at the end, and Kohli dives to his right at short cover to intercept
length ball, just outside off stump, and he jabs this shot into the ground and sends it through to third man for a single
length ball, wide outside off and angling into off stump. Maxwell shuffles across his crease and fends towards point
length ball outside off, and the legbreak has been cut to point. Sharp turn off the deck

full, and flighted on off stump. Pushed towards Jadeja at point and he calls for a quick run. Khawaja needs to hurry because of the fielding who is picking the ball up, but Jadeja can't get the direct hit. Close!
into the sightscreen! And what a way to get to 200. Full on middle, and Maxwell gets to the pitch of the ball and simply lifts this over Kuldeep. Holds the pose too
full on middle, and worked away to the leg side
length ball on leg, and spinning down the leg side. But Maxwell chooses to flick off his legs, and the ball goes to deep backward square
length ball, wide outside off and turning further away. Cut, but straight to point. Drinks
length ball, and he presses forward to defend
flatter, down leg side, and he goes back to punch it towards midwicket
length, but straying on to his pads, and he tucks it away towards the man at 45 on the onside
presses forward and punches a length ball down to long on
length ball, and he presses forward and defends this towards short midwicket
tossed up, and he presses forward to glide it down to long on
short, and he pulls it away towards deep midwicket
length, and he punches it, but cannot beat short extra cover
length, outside off, and he runs it down towards third man
length, just outside off, and he lays into a sublime extra cover drive! Delectable, as he didn't overhit it one bit!
length, and he allows it to come into him with the angle and plays it away towards short midwicket
length ball, and he taps it towards point. Wants a quick single, but has to decline Maxwell's call
eases a length ball over Bumrah at long on. What a shot that was!
drags a length ball from outside off and gets it down to midwicket. What a shot again!
eases into a lofted extra-cover drive. Four again
drives this through covers
rapped on the pads, but was sliding down leg

tucks a ball straight at him down to fine leg and brings up a gritty hundred! Takes his helmet off, and looks up to the skies, as the ground and his teammates rise as one to applaud what has been a really good innings
length ball, and he cannot beat the infield
uses his wrists to flick this away towards long leg
tries to pull one, but it is played on to his pads. In fact, he missed on contact, and that makes it a leg bye
wide of off stump, and he cuts it away to backward point
moves across to the leg side and creates room for a fuller ball at the stumps, and guides it towards third man
tries to force a length ball from outside off, but can only get it down to long off
full ball, and he drives it towards mid off...and Bumrah misfields. Recovers enough to pull it back ahead of the fence, but that just went through his legs!
length ball, slower at 122.6kph, and Maxwell is early into an attempted booming drive. Gets an inside edge, on to his pads, and just past his stumps, as it trickles down the leg side

bad ball, and it gets him a wicket! it is short, and Khawaja latches on to it, looking for the pull. Comes off the bottom part of the bat and carries to Bumrah at short midwicket. What a hand from Khawaja here, though!
full ball, at the pads, and he defends this towards short midwicket
length ball, outside off, and grips after pitching. He rolls his fingers over this, and delivers it at just 118kph, and Marsh has a tentative poke, but misses
length, and he plays it away towards short midwicket, with the natural angle from around the wicket
straight ball, comes into him with the angle, and he defends
length ball, outside off, creeps low, and he looks to defend this from the crease. Close to the off stump, in fact!
length ball, and he goes back to play this towards short midwicket...who misfields. Rayudu this time...as it goes past him and deep midwicket has to clean up
length ball, and he goes back and flicks it towards square leg
slower ball, and he taps it towards short cover and runs! Maxwell would have been gone, if Rayudu had hit this time, but he doesnt...
full ball, raps him on the pads as he looks to dig it out. Vociferous appeal from Bumrah, but not given. Seems to have taken part of the bat along the way. Great ball to end the second Powerplay!
length ball, turns back into Maxwell as he stretches forward to defend. Goes off the inside of his bat and drops down towards short midwicket
tossed up, and he flicks this towards deep midwicket. They go for two, and a throw at the striker's end could have had Marsh in trouble, but Rayudu throws this down to the non-striker's end
defends a length ball coming into him
flicks a length ball turning into him towards short fine leg
tosses this up wide outside off, and Maxwell goes for cow corner, but misses
tossed up, and he drives this towards extra cover, where Kohli misfields! Also seems in a bit of discomfort with his fingers on the right hand. Is that an injury concern for India?
makes room and goes inside out to a length ball just on off-stump. Hit hard, and flat, and deep!
wrong 'un, and he goes back and smashes it down to long off
short, turning away from him, and he forces this towards extra cover

tossed up, and he looks to go down the ground, misses. Dhoni whips the bails off, but Maxwell has his back foot rooted inside the crease, from the look of things. They are checking with the TV umpire, but he had slid his foot back in
length ball, turns down leg, and he gets it down towards long leg

length, outside off, and he goes back and punches this towards cover. Jadeja stops it, and Dhoni hits the stumps at one go off his return! Maxwell is gone, as Dhoni catches him short with a very quick flick on from the throw. Important wicket this!
tossed up, and he flicks this towards midwicket
Stoinis looks for a paddle lap sweep, and gets it off his arms. It pops up in the air on the off side but not close enough to Dhoni
drives a fuller ball down towards long off
uses the angle of the ball coming into him to flick this away towards midwicket
comes down the wicket, Jadeja shortens the length, and he defends it back down the wicket
waits on it, and cuts it back towards third man. They set off for a quick single, and make it...
tossed up, turns away from him, and he punches it down the ground to long off
uses his feet to get to a length ball, but cannot keep his on drive down. And Vijay Shankar moves swiftly to his right, and takes a sharp, low catch!
goes back to a length ball, and punches it with the turn into him, but cannot beat short midwicket

goes forward to a length ball, turns into him, and he's a goner! They also don't have a review left, just like India. Pitched just outside off, but he was very much in front of the stumps, as the ball turned back in. Once it missed his bat, I suspect he knew he could be in trouble.
presses forward to defend a length ball
leaves a length ball turning away from him outside off
starts with a full toss outside off, and he flicks it away towards deep midwicket
length, comes back into him, and he defends this down towards long on
short, wide, and he gets up on his toes and cuts this away past point. Did well to get the required elevation
full toss towards off stump, and he flicks this away towards deep midwicket
fuller ball, on the pads, and he flicks it away towards midwicket
full ball, and he drives this down to long on. Bowled at 137.6kph, this time around
full ball, and he defends back to the bowler
full ball, coming back into him, and he plays it towards mid on
length ball, and he plays it with soft hands towards point
full ball, strikes him on the on the pads, as he looks to play it towards the on side
short ball, and he backs away to the onside and cuts it towards point
length ball, that he taps towards point. They go for a single...always dangerous with Jadeja on the prowl...and they make it as the throw misses the stumps
length ball, and he drives this down towards long on
length, and he backs away and drives this through covers. Vijay Shankar dives away to his right at cover, but cannot stop it. Might have dived over the ball, in fact!
straight as a die! Length ball, and he hammers it straight past long on
looks to swing a length ball around the on side, but loses his shape in the process. Strikes him on the pads, but quite high up
Carey charges down the wicket, and Shami pulls the length ball, as well as slowing it down. He misses the ball as it goes over the stumps
length ball, w, and he punches it towards extra cover, where Rayudu does well to cut off the possible boundary
full ball, wide, and he swings and misses
length ball, and he drives it forcefully, but hits the stumps at the non-striker's end
full ball, and he chops it down on to his leg, and towards short fine leg
full ball, outside off, and he drives it forcefully towards extra cover
full ball, outside off, and he guides this down towards third man. Very well placed to get it beyond point
another scorching yorker, and he just about keeps it out with his bat
drags a length ball from outside off and gets it towards deep midwicket. They are able to switch across for two, but the return hits Carey at the non-striker's end
full ball, and he drives it down towards long off
full ball, and he plays this towards midwicket
full ball, and he hits it hard, but straight towards long on
full toss, outside off, and he drives it forcefully through covers. Was close to being a no-ball, but he met it just below waist height
full ball, strays down the pads and he plays it down to the long leg fence
slower ball, outside off, and he misses out with an attempted cut
length ball, and he makes room and slashes this hard over point. Great shot for the field he's faced with!
fuller, down leg side, chane of pace too, and he plays it away towards long leg
full, wide of off stump, but within the tramlines, as Stoinis fails to reach there. Good bowling, just 133kph

length, outside off, and he punches this through covers. Good shot, as he waited for it to come to him, and then just timed it through the off side. Was a change of pace again, and he picked it early!
full toss, and he hits it hard but cannot beat extra cover
full on off, and pushed to mid off. Calls early for the single and India are off the mark!
length ball, just outside off, and Rohit takes a tiny step forward, before punching to cover
full just outside off, and a bit of movement inwards. Rohit prods forward to drive towards cover point
fullish just outside off, and he pushes forward to drive. Struck well, but finds mid off
length ball, just outside off, and the attempted punch has been inside-edged onto his body
length ball, just outside off, but angling inwards. Nudged off his hips to the leg side
just a bit of swing into the left-hander. Full on off, but coming into Dhawan. Driven from near his body to mid-off
length ball on middle, and straightening after pitching. Pushed off the front foot with the bat's open face to point
fuller, landing on middle but coming into leg stump. Driven towards the leg-side this time, but swiftly intercepted by midwicket
full, outside off, and he drives with the bat's open face. Goes to Maxwell at point on the bounce, and he throws himself towards the right to stop the ball from going for four
length ball on off, and angling in. Checked off his hips towards the leg side
full on middle, and he prods forward to drive. Can't beat mid-off though. Maiden over
length ball, wide outside off, and Rohit simply throws his hands at this with the bat's face opened. Guided to the backward-point boundary
full just outside off, and he gets onto the front foot to drive. Struck to cover
length ball, just outside off, and Rohit steps forward to drive. Comes off the bat's top-half this time, rolling towards the off side
length ball outside off, but angling inwards again. Punched off the back foot, but spliced to the off side on this occasion
length ball, just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to steer a shot to point
glorious! Full on off, and he clears his front leg, before drilling a shot right over the fast bowler's head. Clears the boundary too. Oof
full on middle, and swinging into his pads. The front-foot defense is hit back to Richardson
full on off, but jagging inwards. Driven away from his body towards cover

taken at point! Dhawan's poor form continues. Length ball angling away, and Dhawan can't resist. Tries to lift a cut-shot over point, but doesn't find the elevation. Maxwell keeps his eyes on the ball as he dives to his right, and pouches this while sliding into the grass. Richardson rejoices
full just outside off, and swinging away from Kohli. He pushes this away from his body to cover point
length ball, just outside off, and he prods forward to defend with soft hands
full just outside off, and he looks to drive but the ball's too close to his body for it to go through the covers. Struck to mid-off instead. Another maiden!

nearly chopped on! Length ball just outside off, but nips inwards. Rohit displays no footwork as he tries to work this towards the off side. Ball takes the inside-edge and dribbles down to fine leg. Lucky
back of a length, just outside off, and Rohit shuffles across to cover his stumps, before defending off the front foot

appeal for lbw, but the umpire doesn't give it! Australia are surely reviewing. This was a length ball that didn't rise as much, and Rohit was surprised by the (lack of) bounce. Ball angles in, and hits him on the back leg, so that's worrying for India. Was there any inside edge? There's a bit of a spike, but is that ball grazing the front-pad or bat? Umpire thinks that's grazed the front-pad and ball-tracking says that the ball is crashing into middle stump! A good review, and India lose their second opener too
length ball, just wide outside off, and he plays a late cut to third man for a single
misfield at cover! The curse follows the Australian fielders too. Length ball on off, and punched to Stoinis at cover. But the ball goes through his hands, allowing the Indians to take another run
length ball from wide outside off, but with the ball angling in. Kohli simply prods forward and punches with the bat's open face, and the ball is razing away to the backward-point boundary
full, just outside off, and driven away from his body. Finds cover point though
full outside off, and the ball holds it's line. Rayudu's looking to drive for the ball coming in, and so he plays down the wrong line. Through to the keeper this time
beats him again! Full just outside off, and angling away after hitting the deck. Rayudu looks to drive for the ball coming in, but the ball beats his outside edge again
length ball, just outside off, and this time Rayudu gets bat on ball. Tapped off the front foot towards the off side
length ball, extra bounce off the deck, and Rayudu carves a back-foot punch down to deep point. First runs off Jhye Richardson!
full and very wide outside off stump. Kohli simply puts his front leg near the ball, allows his hands to play through the line. Driven square to the off-side boundary. So easy on the eye!
length ball on off, and Rayudu defends gently towards the off side

what a beautiful ball! India in tatters! Length ball on off, and Rayudu looks to defend off the front foot, but the ball jags away oh-so-slightly, and Rayudu has lost his off stump. Played completely down the wrong line
full on off, and pushed tentatively towards mid-off
length ball, wide outside off, and Dhoni allows it to go into the keeper's gloves. Left alone
full outside off, and he shoulders his arms once again. Through to the keeper
overpitched on off, and he pushes forward to drive to mid-off
length ball, wide outside off, and he opens the bat's face to nudge a shot towards point
length ball on off, and nudged off his body towards the elg side
full and wide outside off, and he crunches a cover drive through the off side. But Maxwell runs across from point and sticks his right hand out to stop the ball
full on off, and he plants his leg across the stumps, before whipping to midwicket
full on off, and he works this from outside off stump by working this to deep midwicket. Two men running towards the boundary-line, and they combine well to stop the boundary
full and wide outside off stump, and driven away from his body to mid-off
length ball, just outside off, and the back-foot punch finds cover point
full on middle, and the attempted leg-side clip doesn't come off the bat. Hits his front leg, and rolls away to the leg side. Impact outside the stumps though
full on off, and he works this - with the incoming angle - to Zampa at midwicket. They scamper across for a single
full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot to mid off. Enough time to call for the single
back of a length, just outside off, and he defends off the back foot to mid-on
length ball, just outside off, but Kohli wants to run this down fine. Tries to guide it towards third man, but the ball whizzes past his bat's edge
back of a length, just outside off, but the ball takes some extra bounce after hitting the deck. Defends uncomfortably towards the off side
length ball angling in, and Dhoni prods forward to defend towards the leg side. Gentle hands
length ball, wide outside off, and clattered off the back foot. Back-foot drive through the off side, and that's a much-needed four for India
length ball on off, and Dhoni prods forward to check-drive. Straight to mid off
pulled! Back of a length on off, but the hometown boy swivels and muscles a pulled-shot past the square-leg umpire
length ball, wide outside off, and through to Carey. Left alone
length ball, just outside off, and Kohli tries to pull. But he under-edges the shot past the keeper's right
length ball, just outside off, and defended off the back foot. Right back to the bowler
length ball, just outside off, and he punches off the back foot to mid-off. Can't beat the infield though
slower ball, length on off, but staying low. Dhoni bends his knees and somehow taps this towards the leg side. Ball could've clearly gone through his defense, there
length ball on off, and once again the bounce stays low. Bends his knees to check a shot towards mid-on
full on off, and defended off the front foot to cover. Dhoni splices the shot and asks for a new bat straightaway
length ball on off, and Kohli prods forward to defend with the bat's open face to cover
length ball just outside off, and he stands tall to punch through to deep extra cover
full just outside off, and Dhoni goes for an expansive cover drive. But the ball whizzes past his outside edge, and finds itself in Alex Carey's gloves
full on off, and he drives with the bat's open face to deep point for one
length ball angling into his pads, and Kohli flicks this fine to fine leg for a walking single
play and miss again. Length ball, wide outside off, and the attempted cover drive goes past his outside edge
length ball on leg, and he tries to pull behind square. Played to square leg
length ball on middle, and Kohli covers his stumps, before punching to wide long-on
length ball on leg stump, and nudged off the back foot to midwicket
length ball on leg, and he muscles an on-drive to wide long on again
full on off, and he plays a whip towards midwicket after getting onto the front foot. Can't beat the infielder though
length ball on leg, and he tickles this fine with the turn. Fine leg has absolutely no chance as India reach 50
full outside off, and he throws his hands at this. Creams a shot through the off side, but there's protection at deep extra cover
length ball, just outside off, and guided late to third man for a single
full on off, and he drills a front-foot drive straight to short cover
length ball on off, and he takes a tiny step forward to defend back to Stoinis
length ball on off, and nudged off the front foot to short midwicket. Misfield from Lyon allows them to pinch the single
back of a length, just outside off, and Kohli runs this down to third man for a single
length ball on leg, and he punches off the back foot to mid-on
length ball on leg, and turning further into the batsman. Whipped off his hips to deep midwicket
full on middle, and skidding away from Dhoni. Tapped away from his body to point

full on off, and turning in as well. Kohli takes a big stride forward to defend, and the ball has hit his front pad. They appeal for lbw but not given. Was there inside edge? Was the ball turning in too much? Ah, inside edge it is.
full on middle, and whipped away to deep midwicket
full on off, and nudged off the front foot to the leg side
shotttt! Back of a length, outside off stump, but he rides the bounce to punch a back-foot drive through the covers. Exquisite.
length ball, just outside off, and nudged off his pads to deep midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to cover
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to cover once again. Can't beat the infield
length ball, on off stump, and worked off his hips to deep midwicket for a jogging single
length ball, wide outside off, and he cuts this square to the fielder at third man. He runs around the boundary to intercept
full on middle, and he shuffles onto the back foot. Worked off his pads to square leg
full on off, and nudged off his toes to deep backward square
full on middle, and he skips down the ground, before working it towards the leg side
full just outside off, and he steps forward to defend towards cover
full on middle, and muscled behind square to Cummins at fine leg
length ball on off, and skidding across. Punched to cover
goes down the leg side, and Dhoni tries to paddle this fine, but cannot beat short fine leg!
tosses this up, and it straightens after pitching on middle and leg, and Dhoni stretches to defend this
comes forward to play a length ball that straightens into him from outside off. Hits him on the pad as he shapes to flick. There's an appeal for leg before but turned down
fired down the leg side, and Kohli leaves. He will have to bowl this again
full, on the pads, and Kohli drives it down to long on
short ball, and this time he goes back and pulls it away. It finds the man at long leg
short, and Kohli latches on to this and gets it squarer, towards deep midwicket. The man at backward square leg has to run around to his left and then send his throw in
sharp turn from outside leg stump, turning further away. Will be called a wide
fuller, outside off, and he paddles this around the corner towards fine leg
length ball, on leg, and he stretches out to flick this towards backward square leg. By the time the man from deep midwicket gets to the ball, they come back for two. FIFTY of the partnership too!
length, and he goes back to punch this to long on

vintage Dhoni! This is closer to his arc, and he doesn't hold back. It's nothing more than a length ball, but he quickly shimmies down the track and swings this over midwicket. Goes high, wide, and handsome
wants to use his feet to this, and Lyon fires it flatter and wider, and he has to defend this
outside off, and he drives it away towards extra cover

gone! No honeymoon homecoming for Dhoni! Full ball, and he looks to swing this down the ground, and inside-edges it on to the stumps. There's stunned silence at the JSCA Stadium, and the crowd just about begins to realise what has happened as he walks back towards the pavillion. This was breezy, but all too brief from MS Dhoni. More importantly, just brings a bit more pressure to bear on Virat Kohli, who is batting beautifully at one end
length ball, and he presses forward to defend. Very precise line and length, and Zampa thinks about a referral. Probably just got the bat first
length, turns away, and he cuts it behind point. Played it late...delectable!
tossed up, turns away from off stump, and he presses forward to defend this
tossed up, and he drives this down to long off
short, and he goes back and drags this away towards long leg. Not off the middle, but Kohli is batting well enough to get four for this!
length ball, and he goes back to defend this
length ball, and he goes back and nurdles this towards short midwicket and picks up a quick single
spins back from outside off, and he looks to cut this away towards third man. Close to the pads, in fact!
tossed up, angles across Kohli, who comes forward and runs it off the edge towards short third man
length, and he goes back and punches this away off his pads towards square leg
shorter in length, and down the pads, and he flicks this away, but there's a fine leg stationed for these dragged down balls
tossed up, outside off, and he drives it towards extra cover
tossed up, outside off, and he chips down the wicket and drives this to long off
presses forward to defend a length ball outside off stump
length, went on straight with the arm, and Kohli goes back to defend this towards midwicket
short, and he goes back and biffs this down towards long on
length, outside off, and he looks to sweep. Hits him on the pads, and runs away towards point. They appeal, but it will only be a leg-bye
length, outside off, and he drops it towards deep point
length, he goes back and flicks this towards long leg. Disappointed at not having pushed for a second, but it was very quickly reached by the fine leg fielder
presses forward to defend a length ball
length ball, and he looks to flick this towards square leg. No possiblity of a run
length ball, and he waits on it as it pitches on middle and turns further in. Tickles this down to fine leg
length, outside off, and he taps it with soft hands to the right of point, and sets off immediately!
length ball, outside off, and he runs it down towards third man. Brings up FIFTY for Kohli!
length, outside off, and he taps it towards short midwicket

length, jags back into him as he shapes to defend. Runs towards third man, and Joel Wilson gives no single to begin with...then he calls it a leg bye later. A bit bizarre that, though the impact was quite high
short, and he he has latched on to this one quickly. Rolls his wrists and keeps it to the right of deep backward square leg. Was going into his body, and he got inside the line very well!
another boundary! Fuller ball, but straying down the pads, and it's the easiest of putaways. Kohli plays the leg glance well, and finds the fine leg fence easily
length, and he comes across to defend this one, pitched just outside off
length, turns away, and Jadhav goes back and punches this towards extra cover
tossed up, and he goes with the turn, square-driving him towards deep extra cover
length ball, outside off, and he presses forward to smother this
tossed up, and he drives it back hard, but Zampa does well to half-stop it. Short midwicket comes around to back him up
short, and he has put this away towards deep midwicket! Sat up and asked to be punished, and he did well to keep this to the left of backward square leg. Couple of bounces, and four!
fuller ball, and he tries to sweep. Gets hit on the pads, and Zampa appeals, but it would probably have struck him outside off
length ball, and he goes inside out. Didn't hit it too hard, but the sheer timing of it takes it beyond the man at deep extra cover. Teases him all the way to the cover fence
length ball, angles into him, and he tucks this away off his pads towards long leg
length, and he presses forward to defend a ball angling into him
length, outside off, and he runs it down to third man. Delivered at 131kph
short of a length, and he shuffles across and bisects fine leg and backward square leg with a terrific flick. Whattay shot!
outside off, and he reaches out and leans into a sumptuous cover drive. Ah, Kohli!
length, and Jadhav presses forward to defend
length, and he plays it with soft hands towards short fine leg
tossed up, and turns sharply into him, and he looks for the drive. It has run off his pads for four. Will Australia review this? No they haven't! Turns back in, and beats Carey too!
flicks a length ball towards midwicket
uses his feet to get to a length ball outside off, and drives it ramrod straight over the bowler's head! Races away into the long on fence
length ball, outside off, and he taps it away towards point
length ball, turns back into him, and he defends this
length ball, and he flicks this down towards fine leg
length ball, and turns into him, and he punches down towards long on. Lyon dives across to his right to stop this, but bangs the turf as it is in vain
length, and he plays it towards square leg
length ball, and Jadhav tries the reverse sweep. Seemed to go too early into it, as it hits his body
runs a length ball outside off towards point
full ball, but starts on leg, and Jadhav lets this go. Hits him on the pads, but pitching outside leg
fired wider, and he misses an attempted cut
length ball, and he turns this around his hips towards square leg
length ball, and he flicks it but cannot beat short midwicket
tossed up, and he forces this past short midwicket
length ball, and he defends towards short midwicket
length ball, and he gets a bit of bat as the ball turns sharply from middle towards leg, and he is able to run it down towards fine leg. Appears to come off the thigh pad, in fact
tossed up, outside off, and he loses shape in trying to biff this through midwicket. Maxwell stops it at short midwicket
fuller, on off, and he drives it with the turn towards long on
length ball, turns into him, and he defends after pressing forward
length, and he taps it towards short midwicket. Glenn Maxwell gets to it and fires in a quick throw, but Kohli is just quicker...
tossed up, outside off, and he forces this away towards extra cover
short of a length, and Kohli tries to come down the wicket, but can get no timing as the ball thuds into his bat as he looks to drive straight
length ball, but down the leg side, and he just gets enough bat to run it down to fine leg. Controlled!
outside off, and he launches into this one! Picked the length early, and stretched into a extra cover drive. Jadhav applauds from the other end
advances down the wicket this time too, but the ball forces him to defend from a good length this time
fuller, outside off, and he looks to drive this towards point, but can't beat the man there
length, outside off, and he just taps it with the bat towards point. Jadhav calls him through, and they pick up nine risk-free runs for the over. Just like that!
length ball, outside off, and he drives this uppishly, but just beyond the reach of point. It runs away towards backward point for four!
shorter, and he goes back and punches this towards long on
tossed up, shapes in to Jadhav, and he is forced to play this straight back towards Zampa

length ball, and he looks to sweep, but gets caught in the crease. Jadhav asks Kohli if he should review, but his captain wants him to walk back. Good bowling from Zampa thus far today, and he is duly rewarded for it. More importantly, good on Australia to break what was a big partnership for India. 88 put together at about 7 an over
length ball, and he looks to drive it. Hits it hard back into the ground
tossed up, outside off, and he opens his scoring by driving this down to long off
tossed up, and he drives this towards short midwicket
length, outside off, and he leans back and cuts this past point. It speeds away on this razor-sharp outfield!
length, outside off, and he comes forward to drive this. It spins in, and beats him, the keeper as well as it runs towards fine leg. What a ball! Perhaps a stumping opportunity missed too!
length ball, spins back in, and he can only defend it back down the wicket
fires this fuller, 95kph, and Kohli goes back to flick this towards square leg
length, and he flicks this away towards square leg
fuller ball, and Shankar unfurls an on drive, towards long on
shorter in length, and he goes back and flicks this towards backward square leg. Wants to push for two, but has to settle for one
fuller, on middle, and he drives it with the turn towards long off
length, turns away, and also bounces a bit. Takes Kohli by surprise as he goes back in wanting to flick it. Has to settle for a defensive shot in the end
length, and he flicks it away towards deep midwicket
fuller ball, angles into him, and Shankar has to go back to defend this
full on off, and skidding away from Kohli. He prods forward to defend, but the ball goes past his outside edge and through to Carey. Replays suggest that was dropped
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to cover

full outside leg, and he goes down on one knee to sweep. Misses the shot, and they appeal for lbw. Not given. Maxwell, however, has convinced Finch to review. Surely this is outside leg stump? Yes, it is. Review wasted. We don't even need to go for ball-tracking
length ball on leg, and skidding into his pads. Flicked away to the gap near midwicket
full just outside off, and he whips a leg-side whip to deep midwicket. Takes the second run, and that's Virat's 41st ODI hundred! QED
length ball on leg, and flicked off his hips to square leg for a quick single. He'll keep strike

full on off, and he muscles a straight drive down to long on. First, Shaun Marsh at long on dives to save the boundary, but the ball is rolling towards the rope, and therefore Pat Cummins, from long off, comes to retrieve the ball. Cummins parries the ball back from just inside the boundary, so Australia save two runs. Commitment at it's best!
over long on! This was a mis-hit, but still it clears the boundary. Kohli kisses the bat after that shot. Full just outside off, and he goes down on one knee to slog over Marsh's head
back of a length on middle, and the ball turns across him. Worked off the back foot to square leg

full outside off, and wild turn away from Shankar. Goes down on one knee to clear the boundary on the leg side, but he can't get the connection. Carey whips the bails off, and the umpire wants to check for a stumping. Nah, Shankar's back-foot is inside the popping crease. No problem
edged! And edged fine! Length ball, just outside off, and he goes for a cut. Takes a thick outside edge, and flies past Carey's right for a boundary
length ball on middle, and skidding down the leg side. He tries to whip it behind square, but it takes his pads and runs down to fine leg
back of a length, just outside off, but the ball stays slightly low. Guided off the back foot to third man
slower ball, full on off, and the ball stays very low! Kohli's surprised by that, but still manages to whip it across to deep backward square for a double. My my
back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce to pull along the ground. Protection in the deep though
length ball on off, and angling into the stumps. Fended off the back foot, back to Cummins
slower ball, wide outside off and Shankar tries to tap towards cover. Inside-edged to fine leg
length ball, just outside off, and Kohli opens the bat's face to run this down to third man. Wanted to play it finer, according to his reaction
overpitched, wide outside off, and Kohli clatters a cover drive through the off side! Deep extra cover has no chance
pulled over midwicket! That's eight runs already. Half-tracker on middle, and Kohli rocks back before muscling this past the fielder at cow corner

Zampa has the last laugh! It's the googly that gets Kohli. Full on middle, and spinning into Kohli. He tries to whip this off his toes to midwicket, but the ball goes under his bat, and clips leg stump. Kohli (as expected) is not happy at all
flighted, full toss on leg stump, and clipped to deep midwicket
full on off, and tapped back to Zampa
back of a length on leg stump and flicked off his pads to square leg
length ball, just wide outside off, and guided to deep points for one
length ball on middle, and the ball cramps into him. Nudged off his hips to mid-on
full on off stump, and driven to mid-off. Toe-ends the shot
length ball angling away, and Jadeja looks to cut. Misses the shot
full on off, and he looks to drive. Takes an outside edge to third man. Ball flies away to the man, Cummins bowling with some real pace now
full outside leg, and the googly goes across Jadeja. Tries to sweep, but misses, and the ball hits his pads. Rolls away to short third man as the batsmen scamper across for a single
full on off, and he defends with soft hands to cover point for a quick single
overpitched, full toss on middle, and punched to mid-on
length ball on off, and turning into Jadeja. He's surprised by the spin, and uncomfortably taps this to the leg side
length ball, on off, and cut square off the back foot to deep point. Played gently enough for the men to come back for the second run
appeal for lbw, but not given! Zampa can't believe it, but Australia don't have reviews. This was full on leg, and Jadeja missed the sweep. Looked close, to be honest, but Jadeja survives
length ball, just outside off, and guided to third man
length ball angling across, and guided with soft hands to point
back of a length on middle, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket. Just a single
length ball just outside off, and the offcutter jars into the batsman. Shankar misses the flick to the leg side, and the ball hits him above the knee roll
another offcutter. Length ball, just outside off, and cut to point for a quick single. Required rate now 9.6
length ball on off, and Jadeja looks to bunt this towards the off side. But it's taken an inside-edge to the leg side instead
overpitched on off, and he digs this out with the straight bat. Struck past Zampa's left, but he gets a hand to it. Slows the ball's pace down
full on off, and he drills this straight to long on. Nearly takes the non-striker with him
length ball on off, and the skidder is nudged off the back foot to midwicket
hammered down to long on, but only a single. Flat-batted this time
full and wide outside off, and he opens the bat's face and lifts a drive right over cover. Nearly goes all the way!
full outside leg, and Carey can't hold on either. Umpire spreads his arms wide
length ball, just outside off, and punched off the back foot to cow corner
length ball outside leg, but the offbreak goes further down leg. The ball is spinning!
full on leg, and tapped off his pads to deep backward square. They want two, but Cummins races in to ensure it's just a single
length ball on middle, and skidding in. Jadeja taps this to the vacant midwicket region, and calls early for the second run. Lyon needs to run and retrieve the ball
length ball just outside off, and once again nudged to midwicket. Lyon chases after it, but only a single this time
full on off, and he slogs through the leg side! Richardson at cow corner tries to stop the ball, but he can't pull it back. Nearly crashes into the electronic wall beyond the boundary
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
taken at cow corner! Shankar goes. Full on off, and he tries to slog across the line again. Toe-ends the shot, and Richardson takes a smart low catch
length ball, just outside off, and guided off the back foot to third man
length ball, just outside off, and the back-foot defense is nearly inside-edged onto his stumps
slower ball, full on middle, and tapped to short point. Dot ball. RRR at 9.54 now
full on middle, and he prods forward to tap this back to the bowler
back of a length on middle, and Kuldeep can't connect with the attempted pull. Through to Carey
back of a length again, and pulled along the ground to midwicket. Only two off the over
full just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to drive. Takes the slice of the bat, and rolls away to the third-man boundary
full on middle, and he pushes this to wide long on for a walking single
nearly through! Full on middle, and skidding through, and Jadeja nearly fails to connect with the defense
full on middle, and nudged to the vacant mid-on region for a single
full on off, and the leg-side tap takes an outside edge. Ball dribbles away to short third man
full on middle, and slog-sweeped to deep backward square. Seven off the over
full, but slow. Lands on off, and defended towards the off side
length ball outside off, and Kuldeep tries to cut, but the ball goes under his bat to the keeper
length ball, wide outside off, and he flat-bats a cut to deep point
slower ball, short outside off, and Jadeja looks to flat-bat a cut through cover. Stopped by Finch though
back of a length, outside leg stump, and Jadeja check-pulls to deep backward square
full on off, and driven with the bat's open face to deep point
full on leg, and clipped to square leg. Gives Jadeja the strike
length ball skidding into middle stump. Defended off the back foot, to Maxwell
full on middle, and he goes for the biggie. Clears his front leg, and slogs it over deep midwicket!
length ball, wide outside off, and cut to point
length ball angling in, and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket. Jadeja wants the second, and he's super quick. In quite easily
full on off, and tapped to point. Jadeja, finally, keeps strike
full on middle, and Jadeja goes for the big shot. Tries to clear mid-on, but he's toe-ended the shot straight to that man. Game over?
top-edged over the keeper! Short on off, and he gloves a pull over Carey. 37 off 16 now
full toss on off, and he mistimes a shot to cover. Looks to go for the big shot, but just not enough muscle behind it
length ball, wide outside off, and Shami flat-bats a shot from outside the stumps, and over to cow corner! Finds the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
back of a length, wide outside off, and Shami wants to cut. Toe-ends the shot, and that's lobbed in the air. Taken at cover. India nine down
full on off, and he digs this away to third man. Says no to the single though
back of a length, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Ball goes through to the keeper
there's the win! Australia stay alive in this series to make it 2-1. Full on off, and Kuldeep goes for a leg-side heave. Slices it into the air, and cover makes no mistake. Australia win by 32 runs
